title: Public assistance sought to identify May 09th suspects (PICTURES)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Police has sought public assistance to identify suspects who were involved in violent acts in Kollupitiya and Galle Face areas on 09th May.

Accordingly, below pictures have been obtained by the Criminal Investigations Department, and Police have requested the public to inform of any details regarding people on photos via the following numbers; 071-8594901 , 071-8594915, 071-8592087, 071-8594942, 071-2320145, 011-2422176.
People will be deprived of transport from next week: Ashok Abeysinghe
